seo.title: Monterosso Events 2025 | Anchovy Festival & Local Celebrations
seo.description: Discover events in Monterosso. Famous Anchovy Festival, patron saint celebrations, and summer beach parties.

body.title: Events in Monterosso
body.subtitle: Home to the famous Anchovy Festival and lively beach celebrations. Experience authentic Ligurian traditions.

features.title: Anchovy Festival
features.description: June. Celebrating Monterosso's famous salted anchovies tradition.

features.title: San Giovanni Battista
features.description: June 24. Patron saint festival with processions and fireworks.

features.title: Ferragosto
features.description: August 15. Beach parties and spectacular fireworks display.

features.title: Summer Concerts
features.description: July-August. Live music on the beach and piazza.

features.title: Easter
features.description: Atmospheric processions through the old town.
